data: If/when testing for Creutzfeldt-Jakob disease, then ensure Creutzfeldt-Jakob disease precautions are taken
Consider additional serology investigations for differential diagnosis

The following Blood tests are required to be ordered concurrently with Oligoclonal Bands CSF. Check if IgG and Albumin Level can be added to previously collected blood samples. Uncheck if already ordered
For autoimmune testing below, CSF and blood samples should be submitted concurrently. Collect prior to immunomodulating therapy and within 12 hours of CSF Collection
Only one mitogen requisition required for each specimen type
